p.text: With this property, you can specify the number of columns and their headers. Indicates the columns in the form: "Stolbets1", "col2". Where Stolbets1 - the title of the first column, col2 - the title of the second.

remarks.text: quotes in writing: "Stolbets1", "col2" - are required. If you want to change the columns in your program, then such action should look something like this: Window1.Tablitsa1.Stolbtsy = "" "Stolbets1" "," "column2" "" Since two double quotes ( "") within the text is converted to a double ( ") and the output obtained as a time:" Stolbets1 "," col2 "
